## Payments

  >

  </Card>
</CardGroup>

## Observability

<CardGroup>
  <Card
  title="Get started with Observability"
  img="https://primer.io/docs/static/obs-banner-503c00029efd22fe161bd556913513fc.png"
>

Complete visibility into your payment stack, uncovering opportunities that boost your bottom line.

[Learn more <Icon icon="arrow-right"/>](/docs/observability)

</Card>

</CardGroup>

<CardGroup cols={4}>
  <Card
    title="Unified data format"
    icon="file-check"
  />
  <Card
    title="Granular payments insights"
    icon="filter"
  />
  <Card
    title="Alerts & monitors"
    icon="triangle-exclamation"
  />
  <Card
    title="Observability API"
    icon="code"
  />
</CardGroup>


<CardGroup cols={3}>
  <Card
    title="Curated Dashboards"
    img="https://primer.io/docs/static/obs-curated-dashboards-431dde1c79bd96a744d4985dde612fe5.png"
    href="/docs/observability/curated-dashboards"
  >
Access instant insights and conduct detailed analysis using real-time payment metrics.
  </Card>
    <Card
    title="Monitors"
    img="https://primer.io/docs/static/obs-monitors-bg-a4f697978016957a3fdd22790c857cdb.png"
    href="/docs/observability/monitors"
  >
Use real-time monitors and alerts to ensure you’re always the first to know when payment problems strike.
  </Card>
</CardGroup>
